    I was born in Chile; currently living in Chicago where I'm an MBA Candidate.

    Even though I have a finance background, my passion has always been technology, and thus it was only natural for me to get interested in Data Science and Machine Learning. As an incurable autodidact, the internet has been my go-to when I want to learn something new, so I believe it is time for me to give back and share what I've learned throughout these years. As such, this place is where I store my thoughts and notes on different areas I'm interested in and also on some side projects.
